description: Updates the contact or escalation plan specified.

parameters.name: ContactId
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the contact or escalation plan you're updating.

parameters.name: Plan
parameters.description: A list of stages. A contact has an engagement plan with stages for specified contact channels. An escalation plan uses these stages to contact specified contacts. Stages (list) --- A list of stages that the escalation plan or engagement plan uses to engage contacts and contact methods. (dict) --- A set amount of time that an escalation plan or engagement plan engages the specified contacts or contact methods. The time to wait until beginning the next stage. The duration can only be set to 0 if a target is specified. The contacts or contact methods that the escalation plan or engagement plan is engaging. (dict) --- The contact or contact channel that's being engaged. ChannelTargetInfo (dict) --- Information about the contact channel Incident Manager is engaging. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the contact channel. RetryIntervalInMinutes (integer) --- The number of minutes to wait to retry sending engagement in the case the engagement initially fails. ContactTargetInfo (dict) --- Information about the contact that Incident Manager is engaging. ContactId (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the contact. A Boolean value determining if the contact's acknowledgement stops the progress of stages in the plan. RotationIds (list) --- The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the on-call rotations associated with the plan. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Stages
nested_params.description: A list of stages that the escalation plan or engagement plan uses to engage contacts and contact methods.

nested_params.name: DurationInMinutes
nested_params.description: The time to wait until beginning the next stage. The duration can only be set to 0 if a target is specified.

nested_params.name: Targets
nested_params.description: The contacts or contact methods that the escalation plan or engagement plan is engaging.

nested_params.name: ChannelTargetInfo
nested_params.description: Information about the contact channel Incident Manager is engaging.

nested_params.name: ContactChannelId
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the contact channel.

nested_params.name: RetryIntervalInMinutes
nested_params.description: The number of minutes to wait to retry sending engagement in the case the engagement initially fails.

nested_params.name: ContactTargetInfo
nested_params.description: Information about the contact that Incident Manager is engaging.

nested_params.name: ContactId
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the contact.

nested_params.name: IsEssential
nested_params.description: A Boolean value determining if the contact's acknowledgement stops the progress of stages in the plan.

nested_params.name: RotationIds
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the on-call rotations associated with the plan.
